This is the landing page associated with the [Warwick-Stats-Resources GitHub repo](https://github.com/Warwick-Stats-Resources).

On the [resources](resources.qmd) page, you'll find details of our projects designed to make it easier to create plots, presentations and course websites consistent with the University of Warwick [brand](https://warwick.ac.uk/about/brand/).

On the [courses](courses.qmd) page, you'll find links to our latest courses.
Upcoming and in-progess courses are also listed here.
